articles.title: Krispy Kreme is offering a limited-edition Mars doughnut to celebrate NASA's rover landing - CNN
articles.description: To celebrate NASA's Perseverance rover coming in for a landing on Mars February 18, Krispy Kreme is offering a limited-edition themed pastry to mark the occasion -- only available Thursday. The Mars doughnut will look like the red planet itself.
